document_data.name: Riverbank Theater
document_data.mainbody: The '''Riverbank Theater''' was a large playhouse located in the city of [[Zhentil Keep]] during the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: The guildhall was located in south Zhentil Keep in the central section of the [[Zhentil Keep/Foreign Quarter|Foreign Quarter]] just north of [[Zhent Avenue]].
document_data.Description: The acoustics within the theater were perfect for projecting sound. The Riverbank Theater could seat 2,500 patrons at a time. Globes of colored glass enchanted with ''[[continual light]]'' illuminated the plush interior.
document_data.Activities: The theater put on nightly performance by bards, jugglers, dancers, jesters, etc. A popular play featured here was ''[[Cyric the Duck Sun]]''.
document_data.History: Before the destruction of the city in the {{YearlinkName|1368}}, the structure was used to house [[humanoid]] armies employed by Zhentil Keep. After the city's destruction it lay abandoned for a brief period of time before being taken over by a group of [[bard]]s and performers who could not escape the city. Upon hearing of the bards' occupation of the building, Lord [[Orgauth]] hired artists to restore the building so it could put on proper shows.
